summary: The Trajan Dungeon features a brand new underground settlement with a new quest, and several unique NPC\'s with custom recorded dialogue.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4286516-1337870924.png[/img][/center]


[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4286516-1337888848.png[/img][/center]

The Trajan Dungeon mod is a story-based mod featuring an in-depth and detailed underground settlement, complete with 9 new NPC\'s, several of which having their own unique, recorded dialogue and personalities.


[b] This mod also features a new Quest- \"The Forgotten treasure\" [/b]

The merchants of the underground settlement of the Trajan Dungeon need the help of a hero. Help them with thier turmoil by delving deep into the catacombs of the tomb, and recieve the ancient lost treasure.

[b]There will likely be more side-quests coming to this mod at a later date.[/b]

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4286516-1337888922.png[/img][/center]

[b] Download with mod manager or, alternatively, download manually, as seen below.[/b]

1) Download the main file: [i]\"Trajan Dungeon UPDATE 1_2\"[/i].

2) Open the [i] \"Trajan Dungeon UPDATE 1_2.rar\"[/i] in winRAR, then  extract [i]\"Trajan Dungeon.esp\"[/i] and [i]\"Trajan Dungeon.bsa\"[/i] to your Skyrim Data folder.

3) Make sure the [i]\"Trajan Dungeon.esp\"[/i] file is checked under data files on the Skyrim Launcher.

[b] To uninstall, simply delete all the files (Trajan Dungeon.esp, Trajan Dungeon.bsa and the Trajan Dungeon.esp sound file). [/b]


[center]Special thanks to Jay Appleyard and Emily Wilden for the voiceovers.

I hope you enjoy this mod.[/center]

[b] Please contact me if you have any problems with this mod. [/b]




[u] [b] KNOWN ISSUES/BUGS[/b] [/u]

~Some followers get stuck at certain points or dissapear completely

~The quest does not advance when people obtain the treasure

~Some NPC\'s in the dungeon vanish or dissapear

~The Treasure does not spawn in the chest so the quest cannot be completed

[b] THESE WILL BE FIXED AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE IN LATER VERSIONS! [/b] 


[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4286516-1337957004.png[/img][/center]
